response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解Gumayusi在T1淘汰AL比赛后的回应内容。根据搜索结果来看，主要是2025全球总决赛八强赛后的采访内容。

先看核心信息：结果1、2、11都详细记录了Gumayusi的赛后采访。他说要全力保持T1对LPL不败纪录，特别提到"相比我们，TES才是需要承受更多压力的那方"。这个表态很有战术心理战的意味，既展现自信又给对手施压。

比赛过程方面很有意思：这场是打满五局的经典战役。结果4显示第一局Gumayusi韦鲁斯就拿下MVP；结果6提到他卡莎四杀扳平比分；决胜局双方打到远古龙团，Gumayusi靠闪现CD精准卡点逃生，最终T1完成翻盘。

关于他对AL的评价：结果30显示赛前他就认为AL是强队，赛后他特别提到对方打野Tarzan的包抄给下路造成很大压力。这种既肯定对手又自信能赢的态度很职业。

有意思的是玄学内容：结果8提到有博主用AI预测AL胜率56.3%，但显然T1打破了预测。而结果16、26则显示部分观众认为AL的BP策略有问题。

需要谨慎处理的是连胜纪录：结果9指出"12连胜"数字未获官方确认，在表述时要避免绝对化。同时结果27、35显示MSI时两队也有交锋，当时Gumayusi用冠军皮肤金克丝carry比赛，这些可以作为背景补充。

整理下来，用户可能不只是要简单回应内容，更想了解：1）具体言论 2）比赛精彩瞬间 3）后续赛事展望。特别是11月2日就要打TES了，这个时间点很关键。考虑在回复时用分段式呈现，把比赛亮点、采访原话、战术博弈分开描述，同时标出关键日期形成紧迫感。


以下是关于Gumayusi回应淘汰AL的核心信息及赛事背景整合，综合自赛后采访、赛事报道及多方分析：
### 一、关键回应内容
1. **赛后表态**
Gumayusi在T1以3-2险胜AL晋级四强后表示：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 11, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227925272271540", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "电竞系学长", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227957125907841", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "召唤师Park", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.16.21.551.551.50/96542c59ly8geqtawegnej20gr0gq0to.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=OQOdIZsiq8", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "vType": 0}}```
- **对AL的评价**：肯定AL为"强队"，尤其提到打野Tarzan通过精妙路线包抄下路造成巨大压力，比赛过程"充满趣味与激情"，结局难料。
- **对粉丝的感谢**：瑞士轮阶段表现不佳仍晋级八强，面对AL先胜后败时粉丝承受煎熬，最终用胜利回报支持倍感欣慰。
- **后续目标**：承诺全力维持T1全球总决赛对LPL战队的不败纪录，闯入决赛为粉丝带来喜悦。

2. **对TES的战术施压**
当被问及半决赛对阵TES时，Gumayusi强调：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "玩加电竞", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227903805563298", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227964033926649", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "玩加电竞", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.10.15.157.157.50/0068GZJSly8h8vlb2gse2j3050050jr6.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=Eo9eTbofzP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227903805563298", "vType": 0}}```
- **心理博弈**："相比T1，TES才是需要承受更多压力的一方"，暗示TES作为LPL独苗背负赛区期望。
- **绝对自信**："各方面我们都充满信心"，并称T1已为BO5准备特殊策略（如第五局红色方选用非常规英雄组合寒冰+萨勒芬妮）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227925272271540", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}], "name": "丶涵艺", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/76c0dacdly8hey0qr5bjnj20go0got9u.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=79Pj7VQ0so", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227925272271540", "vType": 0}}```
丶涵艺
电竞系学长

### 二、赛事关键细节
1. **决胜局高光**
- **BP博弈**：T1第五局选择打野蒙多、中单梅尔、下路寒冰+萨勒芬妮的非常规组合，通过"藏招"策略打破僵局。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227925272271540", "index": 11, "label": ""}]}}```
- **逆转时刻**：远古龙团战中，Gumayusi寒冰卡准闪现CD规避致命伤害，配合团队控下所有地图资源（龙魂+大龙）完成翻盘。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [7, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "电竞系学长", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227957125907841", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227850162768886", "index": 7, "label": ""}], "name": "电竞系学长", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008vVosWly8hrbabqsdmoj30u00u0wgu.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=ZaIxIwdZbC", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227957125907841", "vType": 0}}```

2. **选手数据表现**
- Gumayusi系列赛贡献多局MVP：首局韦鲁斯三杀终结比赛、第四局卡莎四杀扳平比分、决胜局寒冰关键输出。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [4, 6, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "尹天CLANG", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227898804112473", "index": 32, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "英雄联盟赛事", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227840272599664", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "琴女你怎么骂人啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227879608616106", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "尹天CLANG", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.580.580.50/e787c94aly1g3cbk6btbgj20g40g4dgq.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=zv7GfQ8gen", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227898804112473", "vType": 0}}```
- 对位经济压制：某局比赛对AL下路Hope经济领先达7425金币。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227881204551888", "index": 33, "label": "大v"}], "name": "王玮晨", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.480.480.50/005SyZ1Sly8i3tl9bvkkkj30dc0dc3yz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=CaxwjgdpTl", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227881204551888", "vType": 0}}```
王玮晨
尹天CLANG

### 三、背景与争议
1. **历史交锋脉络**
- **MSI预判失误**：2025年MSI时Gumayusi曾预测AL将淘汰BLG，最终AL在败者组决赛被T1 3-2击败。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [27, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "狂很子老", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5187556048376197", "index": 27, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "琴女你怎么骂人啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5187004385984677", "index": 36, "label": ""}], "name": "狂很子老", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/007WuwI6ly8h15o523b13j30e80e8aar.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=pGnzL5ZObX", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5187556048376197", "vType": 0}}```
- **玄学预测翻车**：赛前有AI模拟千次对局称AL胜率56.3%，但实际T1韧性更强。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "吃瓜的空白", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227554862795284", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}], "name": "吃瓜的空白", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/007ZlrToly8hvw4k0pisuj30e80e8q2p.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=aebUmbj5KD", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227554862795284", "vType": 0}}```

2. **舆论焦点**
- **AL教练争议**：部分观众质疑BP策略（如给Hope选工具人AD），认为未发挥韩援Tarzan优势。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [16, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "释荼吖", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227923868228086", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "y努力的张先森", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227955817286341", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "释荼吖", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.850.850.50/0088s49Gly8hyr06r5mh8j30nm0nmmyz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=ggjyhhQOJK", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227923868228086", "vType": 0}}```
- **LPL压力**：TES成为LPL仅存战队，若失利将重现S7决赛LCK内战场景。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [2, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我是电竞小生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227953619471274", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227964033926649", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "我是电竞小生", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006BPLKbly8gx4n5qvexbj30go0gogp4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=0oelkLQoUU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227953619471274", "vType": 0}}```
狂很子老
我是电竞小生
琴女你怎么骂人啊

### 四、半决赛前瞻（T1 vs TES）
- **核心对决**：Gumayusi将与S赛冠军ADC JackeyLove正面对抗，后者以激进打法著称。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- **T1战术储备**：强调"无畏征召"模式（全局BP）下英雄池深度是优势，且已研究TES偏好阵容。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [1, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "竞圈风向标", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226643239209928", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "竞圈风向标", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006W5FBDly8hvshq6akxvj30go0gojtd.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=q9zXnCahgq", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226643239209928", "vType": 0}}```
- **赛事时间**：11月2日开战的BO5将决定T1能否延续"抗LPL神话"或TES创造队史。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [1, 2], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227964033926649", "index": 2, "label": ""}]}}```

> 此回答基于2025年10月31日赛后48小时内的一手采访及赛事实录，结合竞技分析与舆论观察，避免引用非时效性关联内容（如教练Kkoma春季道歉事件）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 11, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "英雄联盟赛事", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227840272599664", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227915722622139", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227925272271540", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "尹天CLANG", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227898804112473", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "英雄联盟赛事", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006hzhGely8i5wr5w2dcwj30go0goq3i.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761956361&ssig=EwukK%2BUJYd", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227840272599664", "vType": 0}}```
